snippet: The agreement targets the seas that join the nations and represents the first environmental dividend of a historic thaw between the two Cold War foes.
abstract: Cuba and United States agree to cooperate on protecting marine life in Florida Straits and Gulf of Mexico.
lead_paragraph: The agreement targets the seas that join the nations and represents the first environmental dividend of a historic thaw between the two Cold War foes.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Cuba and U.S. Announce Plan for Joint Marine Project
headline.main: Cuba and U.S. Agree to Work Together to Protect Marine Life
